title: Monthly Meetups
content: UXPH organizes free monthly meetups all around Metro Manila (and soon outside of it). Meetups range from design talks, workshops, or social events hosted at partner venues.

title: Design Conferences
content: Each year, we hold large-scale design conferences throughout the Philippines featuring keynote speakers, workshops, hiring fairs and a lot more.

title: UX Bootcamp (Coming Soon)
content: Soon you'll be able to learn more about the fundamentals of UX Design and put them into practice in an immersive UX Bootcamp.

title: Design Mentorship
content: UXPH works with some of the country's most experienced designers in offering ongoing mentorship engagements for new and experienced practitioners.
